title: Master Tier ADC LFT
body:
Hi, I'm Looking for a team to play competitively in the 2018 season. My main goal is to get better at the game in a team atmosphere and to eventually play in OOL/OCS and then OPL.

Add me if interested, my IGN is PIuto (i instead of an L).

replies.body: Sorry buddy but the ool doesnt exist anymore.
Oh, didn't realise. That's fine though I'm still gonna try to play in whatever tournament takes it's place.
